result.title: Toy Story
result.overview: Led by Woody, Andy's toys live happily in his room until Andy's birthday brings Buzz Lightyear onto the scene. Afraid of losing his place in Andy's heart, Woody plots against Buzz. But when circumstances separate Buzz and Woody from their owner, the duo eventually learns to put aside their differences.

result.title: Toy Story 3
result.overview: Woody, Buzz, and the rest of Andy's toys haven't been played with in years. With Andy about to go to college, the gang find themselves accidentally left at a nefarious day care center. The toys must band together to escape and return home to Andy.

result.title: Toy Story 2
result.overview: Andy heads off to Cowboy Camp, leaving his toys to their own devices. Things shift into high gear when an obsessive toy collector named Al McWhiggen, owner of Al's Toy Barn kidnaps Woody. Andy's toys mount a daring rescue mission, Buzz Lightyear meets his match and Woody has to decide where he and his heart truly belong.

result.title: Toy Story That Time Forgot
result.overview: During a post-Christmas play date, the gang find themselves in uncharted territory when the coolest set of action figures ever turn out to be dangerously delusional. It's all up to Trixie, the triceratops, if the gang hopes to return to Bonnie's room in this Toy Story That Time Forgot.

result.title: Toy Story of Terror!
result.overview: What starts out as a fun road trip for the Toy Story gang takes an unexpected turn for the worse when the trip detours to a roadside motel. After one of the toys goes missing, the others find themselves caught up in a mysterious sequence of events that must be solved before they all suffer the same fate in this Toy Story of Terror.

Aquí tienes más detalles sobre la primera película de Toy Story:

**Toy Story (1995)**

- **Título completo:** Toy Story
- **Fecha de estreno:** 30 de octubre de 1995
- **Duración:** 81 minutos
- **Calificación promedio:** 7.7/10 (basado en 5,415 votos)
- **Géneros:** Animación, Comedia, Familiar
- **Idioma original:** Inglés
- **ID de IMDb:** tt0114709

**Sinopsis:**
La historia se centra en los juguetes de Andy, quienes viven felizmente en su habitación hasta que la fiesta de cumpleaños de Andy trae a Buzz Lightyear a escena. Temeroso de perder su lugar en el corazón de Andy, Woody conspira contra Buzz. Pero cuando las circunstancias separan a Buzz y Woody de su dueño, el dúo eventualmente aprende a dejar de lado sus diferencias.

**Datos adicionales:**
- Fue la primera película completamente animada por computadora en la historia del cine
- Producida por Pixar Animation Studios en colaboración con Walt Disney Pictures
- Dirigida por John Lasseter
- Marcó el inicio de una de las franquicias de animación más exitosas de todos los tiempos

Esta fue la primera película completamente animada por ordenador y marcó el inicio de la exitosa colaboración entre Pixar y Disney.

result.title: Butterfly
result.overview: A butterfly, a creature symbolising rebirth and a new beginning, epitomises Romina’s and Germán’s world, a world that consists of two parallel realities. In one of them they grow up as siblings who desire each other and try to give shape to their love without sexual fulfilment; in the other they are a young man and woman who form an awkward friendship instead of succumbing to their feelings for each other. Germán finds himself in a discordant relationship with Mariela. Mariela’s brother is interested in Bruno. Bruno is with Romina, but wants to be with Germán. Playfully alternating between these two realities, the lovers find themselves drawn into ever new couplings in order to explore their intuitive feelings – cautiously, but at the same time prepared to lose everything.

result.title: Sum of Histories
result.overview: What would you do if you could change the past?

result.title: OMG, I'm a Robot!
result.overview: A sensitive guy finds out he's... a robot.

result.title: Hibernation
result.overview: 1985. A secret tree house. Two children dressed in animal costumes experiment to revive a bee. But they are searching for a way to bring back something much bigger.

result.title: Say Nothing
result.overview: Housewife Grace Needham (Nastassja Kinski) has a one-night stand with Julian Grant (William Baldwin), who then becomes obsessed with sinking her marriage to husband Matt (Hart Bochner). The twist here is that Julian is a millionaire global powerbroker, and Matt works for him! It's a titanic battle of testosterone as the guys duke it out while Grace simmers angrily.

result.title: The Scientist
result.overview: A reclusive physicist creates an infinite-energy machine in his basement that changes his life and all those around him.

result.title: Doctor Who: The Time of the Doctor
result.overview: Orbiting a quiet backwater planet, the massed forces of the universe's deadliest species gather, drawn to a mysterious message that echoes out to the stars. And amongst them, the Doctor. Rescuing Clara from a family Christmas dinner, the Time Lord and his best friend must learn what this enigmatic signal means for his own fate and that of the universe.

result.title: Black Mirror: White Christmas
result.overview: This feature-length special consists of three interwoven stories. In a mysterious and remote snowy outpost, Matt and Potter share a Christmas meal, swapping creepy tales of their earlier lives in the outside world. Matt is a charismatic American trying to bring the reserved, secretive Potter out of his shell. But are both men who they appear to be? A woman gets thrust into a nightmarish world of 'smart' gadgetry. Plus a look at what would happen if you could 'block' people in real life.

# 8 Películas de Ciencia Ficción Recomendadas (2000-2020, Calificación > 7.5)

Aquí tienes 8 películas de ciencia ficción con calificaciones superiores a 7.5, estrenadas entre 2000 y 2020:

1. **Black Mirror: White Christmas** (2014)
   - Calificación: 8.3/10
   - Año: 2014
   - Duración: 74 minutos
   - Sinopsis: Especial de Navidad con tres historias entrelazadas. En un remoto puesto nevado, Matt y Potter comparten una cena de Navidad, intercambiando inquietantes relatos de sus vidas anteriores.

2. **Doctor Who: The Time of the Doctor** (2013)
   - Calificación: 8.4/10
   - Año: 2013
   - Duración: 60 minutos
   - Sinopsis: Orbitando un tranquilo planeta, las fuerzas de las especies más mortíferas del universo se reúnen, atraídas por un misterioso mensaje. El Doctor debe descubrir qué significa esta señal enigmática para su propio destino y el del universo.

3. **The Scientist** (2010)

4. **Butterfly** (2015)

   - Duración: 103 minutos
   - Sinopsis: Una historia que juega con realidades paralelas, donde los mismos personajes viven vidas alternativas explorando diferentes tipos de relaciones.

5. **Sum of Histories** (2015)
   - Calificación: 10.0/10

   - Sinopsis: "¿Qué harías si pudieras cambiar el pasado?"

6. **OMG, I'm a Robot!** (2015)

7. **Hibernation** (2005)

   - Año: 2005
   - Duración: 15 minutos (cortometraje)
   - Sinopsis: 1985. Una casa del árbol secreta. Dos niños vestidos con disfraces de animales experimentan para revivir una abeja, pero buscan traer de vuelta algo mucho más grande.

8. **Say Nothing** (2001)
   - Calificación: 9.0/10
   - Año: 2001
   - Duración: 94 minutos
   - Sinopsis:

Alan Turing fue un matemático, informático teórico, criptoanalista y biólogo teórico británico nacido el 23 de junio de 1912 y fallecido el 7 de junio de 1954. Es considerado uno de los padres de la informática moderna y la inteligencia artificial.

Entre sus principales contribuciones destacan:

1. Durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial, trabajó en Bletchley Park descifrando los códigos nazis de la máquina Enigma, lo que contribuyó significativamente a la victoria de los Aliados.

2. Desarrolló la "Máquina de Turing", un modelo matemático abstracto que formalizó el concepto de algoritmo y computación.

3. Propuso el "Test de Turing" (1950), una prueba para evaluar la capacidad de una máquina para exhibir un comportamiento inteligente similar al humano.

4. Realizó importantes contribuciones a la matemática, la criptografía, la lógica, la filosofía y la biología matemática.

Trágicamente, a pesar de sus contribuciones, Turing fue procesado criminalmente en 1952 por actos homosexuales, entonces considerados delito en Reino Unido. Se le dio la opción entre prisión o castración química, eligiendo esta última. Murió dos años después por envenenamiento con cianuro, probablemente suicidándose. En 2009, el primer ministro británico Gordon Brown ofreció una disculpa pública por el trato dado a Turing, y en 2013 la Reina Isabel II le otorgó un indulto real póstumo.

Su legado perdura como uno de los científicos más influyentes del siglo XX, cuyas ideas sentaron las bases teóricas de la computación moderna.
Alan Turing nació el 23 de junio de 1912 en Maida Vale, Londres, Inglaterra.

Alan Turing fue un pionero de la informática moderna que descifró códigos nazis durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial, creó el concepto teórico de computación universal con la Máquina de Turing y sentó las bases de la inteligencia artificial con el Test de Turing.

# Console Chatbot Host (Multi‑MCP, Context, Logging)

Natural‑language **console chatbot** that connects to **multiple MCP servers** over STDIO and uses an **LLM API** to understand user intent, call tools, and answer in plain English/Spanish. - Mantiene el contexto de la conversación
- Registra todas las interacciones con los servidores MCP en un archivo JSONL

result.overview: After a terrible car accident, Sedat will do anything to save a childhood friend – even if it means dealing with demons and ghosts.

result.title: Tokyo Ghoul
result.overview: Ken Kaneki (Masataka Kubota) is a university student. He becomes injured by Rize, a human eating ghoul. Ken is saved from the ghoul when a steel frame falls on Rize. They are both sent to the hospital. Ken receives an organ transplant from Rize and becomes a half ghoul.

result.title: Zombie Pizza
result.overview: After losing his father, a teenage boy decides to continue the family business and deliver pizza by bicycle during the zombie apocalypse.

result.title: Ghost Adventures
result.overview: In 2007, The Sci-Fi Channel premiered "Ghost Adventures," a raw documentary in which 3 men go to Virginia City, NV and Goldfield, NV on a ghost hunting expedition. Virginia City is rife with macabre lore and reputed to be one of the most haunted cities in America. Ghost Adventures has won a Grand Jury Prize for Best Documentary that was given by the New York International Film & Video Festival.

result.title: Killjoy's Psycho Circus
result.overview: Killjoy, the demon of vengeance, trickster god and killer clown has finally made it to Earth! Along with his gruesome crew Freakshow, Punchy and the sexy/psychotic Batty Boop, Killjoy is free to terrorize mortals in new and excruciating ways.

result.title: Anabel
result.overview: Anabel and his two roommates are looking for someone to share the rent. They choose an older gentleman who gain their trust, but soon they discover a strange and disturbing presence.

result.title: National Theatre Live: Frankenstein
result.overview: Childlike in his innocence but grotesque in form, Frankenstein’s bewildered creature is cast out into a hostile universe by his horror-struck maker. Meeting with cruelty wherever he goes, the friendless Creature, increasingly desperate and vengeful, determines to track down his creator and strike a terrifying deal.  Urgent concerns of scientific responsibility, parental neglect, cognitive development and the nature of good and evil are embedded within this thrilling and deeply disturbing classic gothic tale.

result.title: Black Mirror: White Christmas
result.overview: This feature-length special consists of three interwoven stories. In a mysterious and remote snowy outpost, Matt and Potter share a Christmas meal, swapping creepy tales of their earlier lives in the outside world. Matt is a charismatic American trying to bring the reserved, secretive Potter out of his shell. But are both men who they appear to be? A woman gets thrust into a nightmarish world of 'smart' gadgetry. Plus a look at what would happen if you could 'block' people in real life.

   - Un documental sobre tres hombres que investigan fenómenos paranormales en Virginia City y Goldfield, lugares considerados entre los más embrujados de América.

5. **Killjoy's Psycho Circus (2016)** - Calificación: 9.0

6. **Anabel (2015)** - Calificación: 8.6
   - Thriller español donde tres compañeros de piso eligen a un anciano para compartir el alquiler, pero pronto descubren una presencia extraña y perturbadora.

7. **National Theatre Live: Frankenstein (2011)** - Calificación: 8.5

8. **Black Mirror: White Christmas (2014)** - Calificación: 8.3

Si naciste el 19 de septiembre de 2003, tu signo zodiacal es Virgo. 

El signo de Virgo abarca las fechas del 23 de agosto al 22 de septiembre aproximadamente, así que naciste justo en los últimos días de este signo. Las personas de Virgo suelen caracterizarse por ser detallistas, analíticas, prácticas y metódicas. También son conocidas por su inteligencia, capacidad de organización y su naturaleza servicial.

result.title: Butterfly
result.overview: A butterfly, a creature symbolising rebirth and a new beginning, epitomises Romina’s and Germán’s world, a world that consists of two parallel realities. In one of them they grow up as siblings who desire each other and try to give shape to their love without sexual fulfilment; in the other they are a young man and woman who form an awkward friendship instead of succumbing to their feelings for each other. Germán finds himself in a discordant relationship with Mariela. Mariela’s brother is interested in Bruno. Bruno is with Romina, but wants to be with Germán. Playfully alternating between these two realities, the lovers find themselves drawn into ever new couplings in order to explore their intuitive feelings – cautiously, but at the same time prepared to lose everything.

result.title: Sum of Histories
result.overview: What would you do if you could change the past?

result.title: OMG, I'm a Robot!
result.overview: A sensitive guy finds out he's... a robot.

result.title: Hibernation
result.overview: 1985. A secret tree house. Two children dressed in animal costumes experiment to revive a bee. But they are searching for a way to bring back something much bigger.

result.title: Say Nothing
result.overview: Housewife Grace Needham (Nastassja Kinski) has a one-night stand with Julian Grant (William Baldwin), who then becomes obsessed with sinking her marriage to husband Matt (Hart Bochner). The twist here is that Julian is a millionaire global powerbroker, and Matt works for him! It's a titanic battle of testosterone as the guys duke it out while Grace simmers angrily.

result.title: The Scientist
result.overview: A reclusive physicist creates an infinite-energy machine in his basement that changes his life and all those around him.

result.title: Doctor Who: The Time of the Doctor
result.overview: Orbiting a quiet backwater planet, the massed forces of the universe's deadliest species gather, drawn to a mysterious message that echoes out to the stars. And amongst them, the Doctor. Rescuing Clara from a family Christmas dinner, the Time Lord and his best friend must learn what this enigmatic signal means for his own fate and that of the universe.

result.title: Black Mirror: White Christmas
result.overview: This feature-length special consists of three interwoven stories. In a mysterious and remote snowy outpost, Matt and Potter share a Christmas meal, swapping creepy tales of their earlier lives in the outside world. Matt is a charismatic American trying to bring the reserved, secretive Potter out of his shell. But are both men who they appear to be? A woman gets thrust into a nightmarish world of 'smart' gadgetry. Plus a look at what would happen if you could 'block' people in real life.

# Rama branch2y

Este es un README diferente creado en la rama branch2y.

## Características de esta rama

- Contiene modificaciones específicas para probar el funcionamiento de ramas en Git
- Sirve como ejemplo de trabajo paralelo en un proyecto
- Demuestra cómo Git maneja diferentes versiones de un mismo archivo

## Propósito

Esta rama se creó con fines educativos para mostrar cómo se pueden crear y gestionar diferentes líneas de desarrollo en un repositorio Git.

## Próximos pasos

- Hacer commit de estos cambios
- Posiblemente fusionar esta rama con la rama principal

result.title: Stephen Lynch: Hello Kalamazoo
result.overview: Whether he’s singing an ode to “queer tattoos,” telling his potential paramour all the things he won’t be doing for her (he ain’t fightin’ no Lion), or lamenting his new vegan lifestyle (“Tofurkey? Tof**k yourself- I want some meat”), Stephen Lynch will always consider himself “a musician trapped in the body of a comedian.” His unique blend of musical based comedy has earned him fiercely loyal fans around the world who live to experience his sold-out live shows, five best-selling CDs, his RIAA-certified Gold DVD and his 2 top-rated Comedy Central Specials. You may also recognize him from his Tony-nominated role starring in The Wedding Singer on Broadway.  Hello Kalamazoo is his first special in over 10 years and was recorded at the end of his Lion tour.

result.title: First Round Down
result.overview: Tim Tucker (Dylan Bruce) was a star forward who broke a knee and never got drafted to the NHL. After the injury, Tim left hockey and became a hitman. Ten years later he finds himself back in town to look after his brother Matthew (Percy Hynes White), with a chance to set things right. But will his past wreak havoc with his shot at redemption? Written and directed by Brett and Jason Butler, First Round Down is a tire-squealing, gun toting, bad ass comedy set in a blue collar town.

result.title: My Future Love
result.overview: In 1973, the 20-year-old Svante has a heart condition that the doctors cannot fix. When he has a breakdown on a subway platform, a strange train suddenly appears. He steps into the subway car filled with wonder, without knowing that the destination is the future. In the future he meets Elsa and together they must solve Svante's problems and figure out how to live together when they are from two different eras.

result.title: Big Jay Oakerson: Live at Webster Hall
result.overview: From the legendary New York City music venue, the man The New York Times called “a master of the dirty joke” dishes on the taboos of growing up with step parents, how to navigate “the friend zone,” and why nobody should feel uncomfortable about cringe-worthy material at a comedy show.

# Las 8 Mejores Comedias (2015-2020)

Aquí te presento las mejores películas de comedia del período 2015 al 2020, todas con excelentes valoraciones:

1. **Frankie Boyle: Hurt Like You've Never Been Loved** (2016)
   - Puntuación: 10.0/10
   - Especial de comedia de Netflix con Frankie Boyle
   - Duración: 64 minutos

2. **The Bachelor** (2016)
   - Puntuación: 10.0/10
   - Una comedia romántica griega sobre un error cometido por una novia que reúne a 4 viejos amigos y un suegro
   - Duración: 110 minutos

3. **Sebastian Maniscalco: Why Would You Do That?** (2016)
   - Puntuación: 10.0/10
   - Especial de comedia grabado en el Beacon Theatre de Manhattan
   - Duración: 63 minutos

4. **Nick Swardson: Taste It** (2015)
   - Puntuación: 10.0/10
   - Especial de comedia grabado en el Paramount Theater
   - Duración: 68 minutos

5. **Stephen Lynch: Hello Kalamazoo** (2016)
   - Puntuación: 10.0/10
   - Comedia musical del artista Tony-nominado
   - Duración: 92 minutos

6. **First Round Down** (2017)
   - Puntuación: 10.0/10
   - Comedia de acción sobre un ex-jugador de hockey que se convierte en sicario
   - Una comedia llena de acción ambientada en una ciudad de clase trabajadora

7. **My Future Love** (2016)
   - Puntuación: 10.0/10
   - Comedia dramática sueca sobre un viaje en el tiempo y un romance entre épocas diferentes
   - Duración: 99 minutos

8. **Big Jay Oakerson: Live at Webster Hall** (2016)
   - Puntuación: 10.0/10
   - Especial de comedia grabado en el legendario venue musical de Nueva York
   - Un comediante que The New York Times describió como "un maestro del chiste sucio"

Es interesante notar que la mayoría de estas comedias son especiales de stand-up o comedia en vivo, lo que refleja la popularidad y alta valoración de este formato durante este período.

result.title: Anabel
result.overview: Anabel and his two roommates are looking for someone to share the rent. They choose an older gentleman who gain their trust, but soon they discover a strange and disturbing presence.

result.title: National Theatre Live: Frankenstein
result.overview: Childlike in his innocence but grotesque in form, Frankenstein’s bewildered creature is cast out into a hostile universe by his horror-struck maker. Meeting with cruelty wherever he goes, the friendless Creature, increasingly desperate and vengeful, determines to track down his creator and strike a terrifying deal.  Urgent concerns of scientific responsibility, parental neglect, cognitive development and the nature of good and evil are embedded within this thrilling and deeply disturbing classic gothic tale.

result.title: Black Mirror: White Christmas
result.overview: This feature-length special consists of three interwoven stories. In a mysterious and remote snowy outpost, Matt and Potter share a Christmas meal, swapping creepy tales of their earlier lives in the outside world. Matt is a charismatic American trying to bring the reserved, secretive Potter out of his shell. But are both men who they appear to be? A woman gets thrust into a nightmarish world of 'smart' gadgetry. Plus a look at what would happen if you could 'block' people in real life.

result.title: The Sleepover
result.overview: The town of Derry has a secret, but no one told the new kid. It's gonna be a long night.

result.title: The Backwater Gospel
result.overview: Backwater is doomed by the regular visits of the undertaker and its dwellers blame a tramp.

Aquí tienes las 5 mejores películas de terror del periodo 2010-2015 según su puntuación:

1. **Anabel** (2015) - Puntuación: 8.6/10
   - Trama: Anabel y sus dos compañeros de piso buscan a alguien para compartir el alquiler. Eligen a un señor mayor que gana su confianza, pero pronto descubren una presencia extraña y perturbadora.

2. **National Theatre Live: Frankenstein** (2011) - Puntuación: 8.5/10
   - Trata sobre la clásica historia de Frankenstein, explorando temas de responsabilidad científica, desarrollo cognitivo y la naturaleza del bien y del mal.

3. **Black Mirror: White Christmas** (2014) - Puntuación: 8.3/10
   - Especial de Black Mirror que entrelaza tres historias, incluyendo una sobre dos hombres compartiendo historias inquietantes en un puesto remoto y nevado, y otra sobre una mujer atrapada en un mundo de tecnología "inteligente" aterradora.

4. **The Sleepover** (2013) - Puntuación: 8.0/10
   - Sinopsis: "La ciudad de Derry tiene un secreto, pero nadie se lo dijo al chico nuevo. Va a ser una noche larga."

5. **The Backwater Gospel** (2011) - Puntuación: 7.9/10
   - Corto animado donde un pueblo llamado Backwater está condenado por las visitas regulares del enterrador y sus habitantes culpan a un vagabundo.

¿Te gustaría saber más detalles sobre alguna de estas películas en particular?
